description: Urapanes del Bosque is a family-run tourism and nature enterprise located in the stunning Araime Canyon of Cajamarca, Colombia. Established in 2018, it transitioned from agriculture to eco-tourism, offering unique accommodations in tree houses. The initiative emphasizes sustainable practices, community involvement, and local gastronomy, providing guests with an immersive experience in nature. Urapanes del Bosque aims to promote environmental conservation while supporting local farmers and artisans, creating a harmonious balance between tourism and community welfare.
name: Urapanes Del Bosque
